verses.verse: כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- If יִמָּצֵ֣א <S%H4672><s%> yim-ma-Tze If [one] be found חָלָ֗ל <S%H2491><s%> cha-Lal, slain בָּאֲדָמָה֙ <S%H127><s%> ba-'a-da-Mah in the land אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God נֹתֵ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten giveth לְךָ֙ le-Cha לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <S%H3423><s%> le-rish-Tah, thee to possess נֹפֵ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> no-Fel it lying בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> bas-sa-Deh; in the field לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo is not נוֹדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> no-Da' [and] it be not known מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> mi who הִכָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H5221><s%> hik-Ka-hu. who hath slain

וְיָצְא֥וּ <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-tze-'U shall come forth זְקֵנֶ֖יךָ <S%H2205><s%> ze-ke-Nei-cha Then thy elders וְשֹׁפְטֶ֑יךָ <S%H8199><s%> ve-sho-fe-Tei-cha; and thy judges וּמָדְדוּ֙ <S%H4058><s%> u-ma-de-Du and they shall measure אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim, unto the cities אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which סְבִיבֹ֥ת <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-Vot which [are] round about הֶחָלָֽל׃ <S%H2491><s%> he-cha-Lal. him that is slain

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah shall be that הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, And it shall be [that] the city הַקְּרֹבָ֖ה <S%H7138><s%> hak-ke-ro-Vah [which is] next אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הֶחָלָ֑ל <S%H2491><s%> he-cha-Lal; unto the slain man וְלָֽקְח֡וּ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-ke-Chu shall take זִקְנֵי֩ <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei even the elders הָעִ֨יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir of that city הַהִ֜וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv he עֶגְלַ֣ת <S%H5697><s%> 'eg-Lat A heifer בָּקָ֗ר <S%H1241><s%> ba-Kar, of the herd אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- has not עֻבַּד֙ <S%H5647><s%> 'ub-Bad which hath not been wrought with בָּ֔הּ Bah, אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher and which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- has not מָשְׁכָ֖ה <S%H4900><s%> ma-she-Chah [and] which hath not drawn בְּעֹֽל׃ <S%H5923><s%> be-'Ol. in the yoke

וְהוֹרִ֡דוּ <S%H3381><s%> ve-ho-Ri-du shall bring down זִקְנֵי֩ <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei And the elders הָעִ֨יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir of that city הַהִ֤וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv he אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָֽעֶגְלָה֙ <S%H5697><s%> ha-'eg-Lah the heifer אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> Na-chal valley אֵיתָ֔ן <S%H386><s%> 'ei-Tan, unto a rough אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- has not יֵעָבֵ֥ד <S%H5647><s%> ye-'a-Ved which is neither eared בּ֖וֹ bo וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo or יִזָּרֵ֑עַ <S%H2232><s%> yiz-za-Re-a'; nor sown וְעָֽרְפוּ־ <S%H6202><s%> ve-'a-re-fu- neck שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעֶגְלָ֖ה <S%H5697><s%> ha-'eg-Lah the heifer's בַּנָּֽחַל׃ <S%H5158><s%> ban-Na-chal. there in the valley

וְנִגְּשׁ֣וּ <S%H5066><s%> ve-nig-ge-Shu shall come near הַכֹּהֲנִים֮ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim And the priests בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons לֵוִי֒ <S%H3878><s%> le-Vi of Levi כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בָ֗ם Vam, בָּחַ֞ר <S%H977><s%> ba-Char hath chosen יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for them the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God לְשָׁ֣רְת֔וֹ <S%H8334><s%> le-Sha-re-To, to minister וּלְבָרֵ֖ךְ <S%H1288><s%> u-le-va-Rech unto him and to bless בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> be-Shem in the name יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and by פִּיהֶ֥ם <S%H6310><s%> pi-Hem and by their word יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and every רִ֥יב <S%H7379><s%> riv shall every controversy וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and every נָֽגַע׃ <S%H5061><s%> Na-ga'. and every stroke

וְכֹ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol, All זִקְנֵי֙ <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei And all the elders הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir of that city הַהִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv, which הַקְּרֹבִ֖ים <S%H7138><s%> hak-ke-ro-Vim [that are] next אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הֶחָלָ֑ל <S%H2491><s%> he-cha-Lal; unto the slain יִרְחֲצוּ֙ <S%H7364><s%> yir-cha-Tzu [man] shall wash אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְדֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei-Hem, their hands עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הָעֶגְלָ֖ה <S%H5697><s%> ha-'eg-Lah over the heifer הָעֲרוּפָ֥ה <S%H6202><s%> ha-'a-ru-Fah that is beheaded בַנָּֽחַל׃ <S%H5158><s%> van-Na-chal. in the valley

וְעָנ֖וּ <S%H6030><s%> ve-'a-Nu And they shall answer וְאָמְר֑וּ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-me-Ru; and say יָדֵ֗ינוּ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dei-nu, Our hands לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor; שָׁפְכָה sha-fe-chah כשָֽׁפְכוּ֙ <S%H8210><s%> sha-fe-Chu cast קאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> had-Dam this blood הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this וְעֵינֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5869><s%> ve-'ei-Nei-nu neither have our eyes לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor רָאֽוּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'U. seen

כַּפֵּר֩ <S%H3722><s%> kap-Per Be merciful לְעַמְּךָ֨ <S%H5971><s%> le-'am-me-Cha unto thy people יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom פָּדִ֙יתָ֙ <S%H6299><s%> pa-Di-ta whom thou hast redeemed יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, O LORD וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not תִּתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> tit-Ten and lay דָּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> dam blood נָקִ֔י <S%H5355><s%> na-Ki, not innocent בְּקֶ֖רֶב <S%H7130><s%> be-Ke-rev charge עַמְּךָ֣ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha unto thy people יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel's וְנִכַּפֵּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> ve-nik-kap-Per shall be forgiven לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem like הַדָּֽם׃ <S%H1818><s%> had-Dam. And the blood

וְאַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah, you תְּבַעֵ֛ר <S%H1197><s%> te-va-'Er So shalt thou put away הַדָּ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> had-Dam blood הַנָּקִ֖י <S%H5355><s%> han-na-Ki the [guilt of] innocent מִקִּרְבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H7130><s%> mik-kir-Be-cha; from among כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- when תַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh you when thou shalt do הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <S%H3477><s%> hai-ya-Shar [that which is] right בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD ס sa-Mek

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- When תֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> te-Tze When thou goest forth לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah to war עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against אֹיְבֶ֑יךָ <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vei-cha; against thine enemies וּנְתָנ֞וֹ <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-ta-No hath delivered יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God בְּיָדֶ֖ךָ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-De-cha them into thine hands וְשָׁבִ֥יתָ <S%H7617><s%> ve-sha-Vi-ta and thou hast taken שִׁבְיֽוֹ׃ <S%H7617><s%> shiv-Yo. take

וְרָאִיתָ֙ <S%H7200><s%> ve-ra-'i-Ta And seest בַּשִּׁבְיָ֔ה <S%H7633><s%> bash-shiv-Yah, among the captives אֵ֖שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet woman יְפַת־ <S%H3303><s%> ye-fat- A beautiful תֹּ֑אַר <S%H8389><s%> To-'ar; be drawn וְחָשַׁקְתָּ֣ <S%H2836><s%> ve-cha-shak-Ta and hast a desire בָ֔הּ Vah, וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ta unto her that thou wouldest have her לְךָ֖ le-Cha לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah. to thy wife

וַהֲבֵאתָ֖הּ <S%H935><s%> va-ha-ve-Tah Then thou shalt bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about תּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> Toch her home בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1004><s%> bei-Te-cha; to thine house וְגִלְּחָה֙ <S%H1548><s%> ve-gil-le-Chah and she shall shave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רֹאשָׁ֔הּ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Shah, her head וְעָשְׂתָ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-se-Tah and pare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- צִפָּרְנֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H6856><s%> tzip-pa-re-Nei-ha. her nails

וְהֵסִ֩ירָה֩ <S%H5493><s%> ve-he-Si-rah And she shall put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שִׂמְלַ֨ת <S%H8071><s%> sim-Lat the raiment שִׁבְיָ֜הּ <S%H7633><s%> shiv-Yah captives מֵעָלֶ֗יהָ <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lei-ha, and וְיָֽשְׁבָה֙ <S%H3427><s%> ve-ya-she-Vah from off her and shall remain בְּבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1004><s%> be-vei-Te-cha, in thine house וּבָֽכְתָ֛ה <S%H1058><s%> u-va-che-Tah and bewail אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָבִ֥יהָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-ha her father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אִמָּ֖הּ <S%H517><s%> 'im-Mah and her mother יֶ֣רַח <S%H3391><s%> Ye-rach month יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim; a full וְאַ֨חַר <S%H310><s%> ve-'A-char and after כֵּ֜ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that תָּב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo that thou shalt go אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha about וּבְעַלְתָּ֔הּ <S%H1167><s%> u-ve-'al-Tah, archer וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah become לְךָ֖ le-Cha לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah. and she shall be thy wife

וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- shall be if לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> lo are not חָפַ֣צְתָּ <S%H2654><s%> cha-Fatz-ta And it shall be if thou have no delight בָּ֗הּ Bah, וְשִׁלַּחְתָּהּ֙ <S%H7971><s%> ve-shil-lach-Tah in her then thou shalt let her go לְנַפְשָׁ֔הּ <S%H5315><s%> le-naf-Shah, whither she will וּמָכֹ֥ר <S%H4376><s%> u-ma-Chor but thou shalt not sell לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not תִמְכְּרֶ֖נָּה <S%H4376><s%> tim-ke-Ren-nah her at all בַּכָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> bak-Ka-sef; for money לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תִתְעַמֵּ֣ר <S%H6014><s%> tit-'am-Mer thou shalt not make merchandise בָּ֔הּ Bah, תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat Thahash אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher of her because עִנִּיתָֽהּ׃ <S%H6031><s%> 'in-ni-Tah. thou hast humbled ס sa-Mek

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- If תִהְיֶ֨יןָ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yei-na has לְאִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> le-'Ish If a man שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei have two נָשִׁ֗ים <S%H802><s%> na-Shim, wives הָאַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> ha-'a-Chat one אֲהוּבָה֙ <S%H157><s%> 'a-hu-Vah beloved וְהָאַחַ֣ת <S%H259><s%> ve-ha-'a-Chat and another שְׂנוּאָ֔ה <S%H8130><s%> se-nu-'Ah, hated וְיָֽלְדוּ־ <S%H3205><s%> ve-yal-du- and they have born ל֣וֹ lo בָנִ֔ים <S%H1121><s%> va-Nim, him children הָאֲהוּבָ֖ה <S%H157><s%> ha-'a-hu-Vah [both] the beloved וְהַשְּׂנוּאָ֑ה <S%H8130><s%> ve-has-se-nu-'Ah; and the hated וְהָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah has הַבֵּ֥ן <S%H1121><s%> hab-Ben son הַבְּכ֖וֹר <S%H1060><s%> hab-be-Chor and [if] the firstborn לַשְּׂנִיאָֽה׃ <S%H8146><s%> las-se-ni-'Ah. be hers that was hated
